content: say hello to one of your favorite baby crochet patterns with the puff baby hat you re gonna love it it s a really simple design that any new mom would love it uses the crochet puff to create texture and is made with two colors to make the puffs really stand out available at i love stitches 1 for $4 95 1 https //ilovestitches com/collections/crochet-patterns/products/puff-stitch-baby-hat-crochet-pattern 2 https //makerdrop com/products/puff-stitch-baby-hat-crochet-pattern
